name: This World Unknown
description: A medieval fantasy visual novel with an otome twist. Rhea works as a nurse in a village hospital and lives a peaceful life - until one of her patients contracts a mysterious illness. Go on an exciting adventure, meet a varied cast, and see if true love conquers all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8 (32 bit or 64 bit) Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any audio output

reviews.review_text: This is a truely wonderful visual novel. The art style is quite different from what I am used to playing but i feel that it only emphasizes the story and helps to make the characters more relateable. The backgrounds and music are also very good and I don't regret purchasing this game at all. I would definitly recommend it.
